headline: Union Pacific Postpones Merger Filing, CPKC Warns of Two-Railroad Future
summary: The filing setback comes as UP racks up tens of millions in merger costs and faces opposition from rivals and trade groups concerned about consolidation.

raw.headline: Union Pacific Postpones Merger Filing, CPKC Warns of Two-Railroad Future

headline: Union Pacific Corp. stock underperforms Wednesday when compared to competitors despite daily gains

headline: How Investors May Respond To Union Pacific (UNP) Facing BNSF’s Challenge To Merger Competition Rules
summary: Berkshire Hathaway’s BNSF Railway has asked the U.S. Surface Transportation Board to revisit and potentially change the nearly 30-year-old competitive conditions attached to Union Pacific’s merger with Southern Pacific, arguing Union Pacific has not fully honored commitments to preserve competition. This regulatory challenge could reshape how Union Pacific grants competitive access on key routes, with possible consequences for its market position and operating flexibility across the rail...
